name: Program naming convention
description: ABAP programs should begin with Y, Z, SAPLY or SAPLZ. This reports shows all the ABAP programs not starting with one of these these prefixes. Prefixes are parameters and can be changed at will.
output:
This rule lists all ABAP Programs that do not respect naming conventions.
It provides following information:
- ABAP Program full name
rationale: SAP requires naming conventions for custom developments.
remediation: Change name according to the SAP naming convention.
